field.name: summary
field.value: Hook, selector, and mixins not working with serialization in DP 2

field.name: description
field.value:
Currently, DP 2 does not include the ProxyGenerationOptions when serializing a proxy, therefore, mixins, selectors, and hooks are lost on deserialization.
I've attached a patch with test cases and a fix. Serialization of the ProxyGenerationOptions is not trivial, because there are cases where a trivial fix (with just the [Serializable] attribute) would break proxy serialization (see code comments in the patch). Instead, ProxyGenerationOptions now manually implements ISerializable.
